metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0047 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Docker before 1.5 allows local users to have unspecified impact via vectors involving unsafe /tmp usage.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4').
